00037         std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Photon> > get_k_nearest(const Point3D& point, int k )
00038         {
00039             unsigned int k_ ;
00040 
00041             if(k < 0)
00042             return _photons ;
00043         else
00044             k_ = (unsigned int)k ;
00045 
00046         if(k_ > _photons.size())
00047             return _photons ;
00048 
00049             std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Photon> > ret(k_) ;
00050             ret.clear() ;
00051 
00052                 std::sort(_photons.begin(), _photons.end(),
00053                                 PhotonNearerFromNaive(point)) ;
00054 
00055                 for(unsigned int i = 0 ; i < k_ ; i++ )
00056             ret.push_back( _photons[i] ) ;
00057 
00058                 return ret ;
00059         }
